title: The Secret Ingredient (Wasabi): Wasabi Chocolate Pudding Recipe
full_text:
The Secret Ingredient (Wasabi): Wasabi Chocolate Pudding Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Chilling Time
8 hrs
Total
8 hrs 5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
(5.9-ounce) packet
instant chocolate pudding
3
cups
whole milk
3/4
cups
Dutch
cocoa
2
tablespoons
wasabi powder
Zest
of
2
limes
Directions
Whisk everything together, spoon into your serving glasses or ramekins, cover with plastic wrap so that the wrap is in contact with the pudding to prevent a skin, and refrigerate overnight. Top with a dash of wasabi powder before serving.
Custards, Mousses & Puddings
